details: National Day of HaitiSaturday, January 3, 2026 – 49ers red/gold – in recognition of SF 49ers vs Seattle Seahawks for NFC’s No. 1 playoff seedSaturday, January 10, 2026 – 49ers red/gold – in recognition of SF 49ers vs Philadelphia Eagles for NFC’s Wild Card gameFriday, January 16, 2026 – “tie-dye” – in recognition of Celebrating the cultural significance and enduring influence of the Grateful Dead on San Francisco’s identitySaturday, January 17, 2026 – 49ers red/gold – in recognition of SF 49ers vs Seattle Seahawks for NFC’s Divisional Round gameMonday, January 19, 2026 – red/green/black – in recognition of MLK, Jr HolidayMonday, January 26, 2026 – blue/white/red – in recognition of National Day of AustraliaTuesday, January 27, 2026 – saffron/white/green – in recognition of National Day of IndiaRequest City Hall lighting in specific colors to honor a cause
